Description:
Skills:
- Basic knowledge and understanding of geology and the oil and gas industry.
-Ability to collect, analyze, and interpret geological data and information.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to make accurate observations and assessments.
- Skilled in using various tools and equipment to log and record data.
- Familiarity with standard laboratory procedures and techniques.
- Good communication skills, written, to effectively report findings and collaborate with team members.
- Ability work in challenging and fast-paced environments, often in remote locations and adverse weather conditions.
- Attention to detail and accuracy in data collection and interpretation.
- Knowledge of health and safety regulations and practices in the oil and gas industry.
- Proficient in using computer software and applications related to data analysis and reporting.Job Details
